Just downloaded it, quality is great, audio is great, could be worth watching. Thanks a lot. =)
@secondincommand if your using VLC media player (Which is what i use) you can go to Video>Subtitles Track>Disable. Download it if you don't have it, it's great and simple. Offers everything.

A:9
V:10
M:10
To get subtitles turned off, I played it in VLC Media Player and disabled the subtitles by going to: Video...Subtitles Track...Disable.  You will have to do this every time you restart the movie.  Enjoy.
